name: tvSort
tagline: A small program (My first project in Java) that organised downloaded TV shows
body:
tvSort - Sort your TV shows ====== A small program (My first project in Java) that organised downloaded TV shows
Only working if file has the standard format e.g. **Family.Guy.S01E11.XX.XX.XX.xxx** ## Notes ## tvSort uses only the configuration file to know what to search for, no internet required
Shows are sent to: **X:\\ [Downloads-Directory] \\ [TV-Show-Name] \\ [Season #]**
I also used this project to test GitHub for Windows and GitHub Pages! ## Usage ## 1. Open config.txt 2. Add download folder location and TV Show folder location where specified 3. Add TV Shows you want to sort to the 'Sort List' 4. Save and close 5. Run Program!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
